title: Transition from Galaxy J3 to Pixel 4a Alarms was a disappointment
content: I often set Alarms on my phone.  On my J3, I was able to set an alarm for a date in the future.   However, with my new Pixel 4a, I am unable to set an Alarm for a future date.  Using Reminders and Calendar Events as Alarms just doesn't have the same effectiveness--partially because I usually have my phone in DND mode because of frequent robo calls.  Has anyone had the same problem?  Any suggestions?  Might Google enhance their Alarm app to allow future dates?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
